body: I feel like answering questions, so shoot!

title: Snow's 2nd AMA

replies.body:

If so, at what time?
For example:
Morning, Afternoon, Evening, MIDNIGHT? ;)

Do you prefer honey or maple syrup?

It is purely random. A black skin with red "bolts" around it. 
It's actually a temporary skin until I can retrieve my old skin from my old computer :)

replies.body:
My name comes from a collection of my favourite games as a little Snowman.
SSX and Midtown Madness 3
That's the "SX3"
Snow is just a name I made. I guess you can tie it in with the SSX theme though.

My favuorite map is Frostbite.

There is this other one that I can't remember the name of.
It's a one hit,kill TDM map. And it only has three letters in the name...
I think it had a "Z" in it?...idk xD

My favourite colour is green!

replies.body:
I believe the TDM map you are talking about is called "Zao."

I remember it, but then one day it suddenly got removed from the Nebula rotations... 

I believe they removed all the TDM maps in Nebula except Venomous for a reason...

And I don't know why.

Ah yes, it was Zao. That was an awesome map. 
Early Avicus memories for me, good times!
Thanks!
